entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:35 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -26.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
